mdRecord.dcterms:title: The centennial of the University of Virginia, 1819-1921: the proceedings of the Centenary celebration, May 31 to June 3, 1921 / Editorial Committee, John Calvin Metcalf, Chairman, Fiske Kimball, Robert Henning Webb, Bruce Williams, James Southall Wilson
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Metcalf, John Calvin, 1865-1949
University of Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: G. P. Putnam's Sons, The Knickerbocker Press
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Original blue cloth, with gold medallion portrait of Jefferson on front.
ALDERMAN: Some copies: Photocopy. Charlestown, Massachusetts : Acme Bookbinding, 2000.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LD5686 1921 .A5 1922 COPY 2: From the books of John Lloyd Newcomb.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LD5686 1921 .A5 1922 COPY 3: Signature of W.H. Wranek Jr. Wranek gift.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LD5686 1921 .A5 1922 COPY 5: From the Papers of Joseph L. Vaughan, MSS 12716-c. With occasional marginal notes and a presentation inscription "To Ann from Joe March 12, 1930."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LD5686 1921 .A5 1922 COPY 6: Bookplate of Robert Baylor Tunstall, with his signature. "The lawn" by Arthur Kyle Davis (3 p.; 24 cm.), laid down on rear pastedown.
Item X000471311 has bookplate data: Mrs. McLane Tilton. Item X001133043 has bookplate data: William Mynn Thornton.
